column3: str
Jude eagerly awaits you.
Deliver aetherial amplifiers to Jude.
<Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>, let us jump straight into the next part of the process!
I ask that you would craft another vital part of the starlens.
You see, the operation of this particular type of telescope requires highly specialized magic.
While I understand the mechanics behind this magic, the sheer volume required far surpasses that at my disposal.
Please, might you be so kind as to craft aetherial amplifiers for me?

There are no words to express how thankful I am, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. Not only are you assisting me with producing the starlens, but you continue to encourage me every step of the way!
The Studium Deliveries list for Jude has been updated. To view the new list, speak with Jude.
With the aetherial amplifiers, I should finally be able to channel enough magic to operate our starlens!
Isn't she beautiful!
<Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>, it's absolutely perfect! Thank you.
I've just finished looking over the last delivery. We are so close to having all the parts necessary to begin assembly!
Jude, today must be your lucky day─the ever-busy Jeromere has decided to grace you with his presence!
Wh-Who are these people!? No doubt they're here to extort coin from me! I must report them to the Studium's guard posthaste!
Thinking aloud again, are we?
You need not worry. They are with me. In fact, they are members of the poetry group I mentioned. I brought them here so everyone could get acquainted.
It's nice to meet you, Jude!
S-She's speaking to me!
Of course she's speaking to you. That is, of course, the reason we are here, is it not?
Ah, you must be the crafts<If(PlayerParameter(4))>woman<Else/>man</If> assisting Jude. Do also feel free to drop in on one of our poetry meets sometime, should it strike your fancy!
So what do you think? A magnificent group of people, are they not? We were just on our way to the Last Stand─would you care to join us?
Steady now. Jeromere is trying to help you. He knows you have no friends, and is attempting to coax you out of your shell. You really should be thankful...truly.
Absolutely not.
Apologies, but I am currently in the middle of producing something known as a starlens. Perhaps another time...
What is this nonsense!?
Come now, Jude. Join us just this one time. Only regret awaits, should you continue down this dark path.
How can you say that with such certainty?
Trust me, he knows exactly what he's talking about!
Please, that's enough. L-Let us just be on our way, shall we?

<sigh> Having to meet new people is quite draining... I must say, however, I'm rather proud of myself. Normally, I would have been so nervous, even the thought of speaking would cause me to lose consciousness! I must be growing.
What will you say?
You did well.
You're improving.
Get a hold of yourself!!!
It is you I have to thank, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>! Your continued support has allowed me to really blossom.
B-But I am calm...!
...Did I just speak up for myself? It seems I have changed even more than I initially thought since meeting <If(PlayerParameter(4))>her<Else/>him</If>.
I see! It was a test. No doubt <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/> was trying to see just how much I have grown!
Now enough about me! We are so close to the finish line. With just a bit more work, the starlens will be complete!
Before we proceed, however, there is one thing I must confirm.
Please come back to see me when you next find the time.
Thanks to <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>, the chocobo in my heart has transformed into a mighty hobgoblin!
Jude is overjoyed with your efforts. He now considers you a <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Good-natured Individual<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>!
A new quest continuing the story of the Faculty of Astronomy is now available. Upon its completion, the Studium Deliveries list for Jude will be updated.
